<div style="height: 1.5em;"></div>

Ecology is integrative, interactive, and interdisciplinary. Always open to new ideas!

<div style="height: 1em;"></div>

I have years of experience in statistical analysis and programming in R; I highly value these quantitative skills—they are the "weapons" that allow me to tackle the research questions. I'm also into data visualization—creating awesome ggplots for effective science communication definitely brings me a great sense of joy and achievement!
